title: Tlang thim chhak lam kei ka en ang
lyrics:
Tlang thim chhak lam kei ka en ang,
Nakinah zan a ral ang;
Thimna zawng zawng a ral vek ang,
Ni a chhuak, khua a var ang.
Isua Krista, Khawvel Entu'n,
Thinlung thim a tieng ang;
Kan khawvela hnam tin zingah,
Chanthin Tha an hre vek ang.

Chhim lam, hmar lam, chhak lam, thlang lam,
Khaw tinah i hming an lam;
Zawlnei der, puithiam leh dawithiam,
Tumahin an duh lo vang.
Isu, min tidamtu i ni,
Khawvel sual kalpui i ni;
Thing kraws chungah an khia kang che,
I thihin min tlan a ni.

Lal zawng zawngte Isua hnenah,
Ram zawng zawngte ama ta;
Mi zawng zawngten an be fo vang,
Pathian ram a zau zual ang.
Nangma ramah Lusei, Hmar te,
Pawih leh Ralte, Lakher te,
Hnam zawng zawng ko leh ang che,
Kohhranho tikhat ang che.

Krista Isu, sual ngam ang che,
Ram zawng zawng luah vek ang che,
Chanchin Tha leh Tirhkoh Thiltih,
Baibul thu malsawm ang che.
Ruah sur leh thlifim nuam angin,
Ni eng leh dai tlang angi,
I Thlarau min pe hlawm ang che,
Kumkhuain min veng ang che.
